item.title: [SRL] Acoole's Auto Chopper
item.dc:creator: @acoole acoole
item.description:
@acoole wrote:

[b]Ok, this may not work with Scar Divi and the new SRL, as i just managed to recover this from my broken P.C and my new(well old) p.c has got scar, but i haven’t got time to test it with runescape.

Here Goes:
[/b]

[code]///////////////////////Acoole’s Auto Cutter/////////////////////////
/////////////////// Developed & Written By Acoole///////////////////
/////////////////////Studied Other Users Script Thanks!/////////////
// Release Notes:
// This is not FULLY tested as my P.C is kinda broken.
// It’s only simple.
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
////////////////////////Installation////////////////////////////////
// 1. You must have a program called “Scar”.x(any) version.
// 2. You Must have SRL
// 3. Drag the crosshair over the runescape
// 4. Login top runescape, choose the colour of the tree you want
// 5. Write the number where it says “treecolor1” in the script
// 6. Click Play and have a nice day.
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

program acchop
{.include srl/srl.scar}
{.include srl/srl/skill/woodcutting.scar}

const
treecolor1=15123344; //–=MUST CHANGE=-- simply you musT!..//
timetochop=15000; //–Can change, its telling how long it will chop for–

procedure chop;
begin
if(findcolorspiraltolerance(x,y,treecolor1,msx1,msy1,msx2,msy2,25))then
mmouse(x,y,3,3)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
begin
mouse(x,y,3,3,true)
end;
end;

procedure treewait;
begin
wait(timetochop)
end;

procedure findrandoms;
begin
FindNormalRandoms;
end;

begin
cleardebug;
setupsrl;
activateClient;
repeat
treewait;
chop;
until(false)
end.[/code][b]

This is my 3rd script.
My other scripts are:
Auto talker,
Chicken killer(i think i haven’t posted that yet)
and this one.

Please test it.

Thanks,
-Acoole

Read full topic
